page.title: 01Milnathort,Parish of Orwell
page.content: The area is part of the former{County {of Kinross,}now within{Tayside Region. The block is fairly sparsely populated covering a rural area and comprising mainly farmland. The northern part of {Loch Leven}accounts for over a third of the block. {Milnathort}is in the north-west corner of the block, the upper half of the village rising towards the 18th cent. church. The north east corner of the block rises in the lower slopes of the {Lomond Hills.}Between these two higher areas the land is undulating,levelling towards the loch. The west side of the block, beside{Kinross,}is much flatter. Agriculture is the main industry; high quality crops and stock are produced. Tourism income is minimal, most visitors either passing through or outside the area on the {M90 Motorway.
